creditline: Gift of Tom and Marsha French in honor of Tom Rassieur
description: sketch of a large sailing ship in foreground, with other sketchy boats in background
dimension:
1 13/16 x 7 in. (4.6 x 17.78 cm) (sight)
8 x 13 in. (20.32 x 33.02 cm) (outer frame)
inscription:
Title, Inscription and Stamps

Various inscriptions and notations in French, verso.
markings: LLC, stamped in purple: [FB (circle with line)]; LRC, stamped in red: FB owl stamp
provenance: The artist; Estate of the artist. (Galerie Grillon, Paris); (Eric G. Carlson Fine Prints and Drawings, New York, c. 1992); Thomas French, Fairlawn, Ohio, April 2011; his gift to the MIA, June 2011
signed: LLC, in pencil: [H.M.S. Hwooood (?--illegible)]; and LRC, in pencil: [Gillingham pres Chatham]
title: The H.M.S. ... at Gillingham near Chatham
